pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 4 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Very Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Sneak to change between modes. $(br)When active you stop falling for some while. Consumes durability

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 500 $(br2)Duration is now infinite. $(br)Frequency is increased
